visible_instructors.name: Leila

objectives_summary: Discover what emotional intelligence (EQ) is and why it is so important for your career
Identify the signs of high and low EQ in yourself and those around you
Avoid being hijacked by a “gut” reaction brought about by low EQ

items.title: Consulting Approach to Problem Solving

visible_instructors.job_title: Business and Technology Senior Manager, Lecturer

items.headline: Solving business problems and business cases using hypothesis-based problem solving - method of top consulting firms
objectives_summary: You will understand and appreciate the problem solving technique used by the top consulting firms like McKinsey, BCG, Bain and Strategy&
At the same time you will get acquainted with how business and consulting projects ought to be structured
You will master the basic knowledge on hypothesis-based problem solving that will let you proceed to more advanced courses on solving business problems
